APP.CURRENTLY_OFFLINE: You are currently offline. To access all the recent pictures and upload new ones please go online first.
APP.DEEPLINK_ERROR: Sorry but the called url is not valid!
APP.DEEPLINK_NOT_LOGGED_IN: To visit this link you have to be logged in. So please login first
APP.DISPLAY_PARTY_VIEW_ERROR: Sadly it was not possible to set the picture to be display.
APP.DISPLAY_PARTY_VIEW_ERROR_OFFLINE: To display a picture please go online first!
APP.DISPLAY_PARTY_VIEW_TEXT: You are currently in a different Display Mode. The mode will be changed to "Display Selected".
APP.INVITE_GUESTS_ERROR: There was a problem so the guest could not be invited.
APP.INVITE_GUESTS_ERROR_OFFLINE: To invite guests please go online first!
APP.INVITE_GUESTS_TEXT: Hello! I want to invite you to join the party "{{partyname}}" on PartyPics.co. Simply click on the link. You will then be added to the party automatically if you have the app installed. If not the Download-Links will be displayed. After you downloaded the app simply visit the link again to join the party. This currently only works for Android. On iOS you have to install the app and then scan the displayed QR-Code.
APP.FULLSCREEN_ERROR_OFFLINE: To display a picture in fullscreen mode go online first!
APP.JOIN_PARTY_ERROR: There was a problem joining the party:
APP.JOIN_PARTY_ERROR_ALREADY_GUEST: You are already a guest of this party.
APP.JOIN_PARTY_ERROR_NOT_VALID: The code is not a valid party code.
APP.JOIN_PARTY_ERROR_OFFLINE: To join a party please go online first!
APP.JOIN_PARTY_ERROR_SCAN: There was a problem scanning the code.
APP.LOGOUT_ERROR_OFFLINE: To logout please go online first!
APP.NO_LONGER_GUEST: You are not longer guest of "{{partyname}}". So the currently active party got changed.
APP.QR_CODE_ERROR: There was a problem receiving the QR-Code of the party.
APP.QR_CODE_ERROR_OFFLINE: To display the QR-Code please go online first!
APP.QR_CODE_POPUP_TEXT: Let other guests scan this QR-Code to join the party!
APP.CURRENTLY_OFFLINE: You are currently offline. To access all the recent pictures and upload new ones please go online first.
APP.SEND_DOWNLOAD_LINK_ERROR: There was a problem so the download links could not be send.
APP.SEND_DOWNLOAD_LINK_ERROR_OFFLINE: To send download links please go online first!
APP.SEND_DOWNLOAD_LINK_TEXT: Hello! Here the links to easily install PartyPics.co. For Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=co.partypics and for iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/partypics.co/id943496546?mt=8&uo=4
APP.SHARE_ERROR: There was a problem and the picture could not be shared.
APP.SHARE_ERROR_OFFLINE: To share a picture please go online first!

CAMERA.SELECT_PICTURE_ERROR: There was a problem selecting a picture!
CAMERA.NO_ACTIVE_PARTY: Currently no party is active. To upload pictures you have to join or create a party first.
CAMERA.TAKE_PICTURE_ERROR: There was a problem taking a picture!
CAMERA.UPLOAD_ERROR: There was a problem uploading the picture: "{{error}}"
CAMERA.UPLOAD_ERROR_OFFLINE: To upload a picture please go online first!
CAMERA.UPLOAD_ERROR_NO_PARTY_ACTIVE: Can not upload picture because currently no party is selected.
CAMERA.UPLOAD_ERROR_SAVED_PICTURE: Picture could not be uploaded: "{{error}}". Picture got saved to your image library.

GENERIC.DATA_ERROR: Was not possible to receive data
GENERIC.DATA_OFFLINE: You are offline please go online
GENERIC.NO_INTERNET_CONNECTION: It was not possible to connect to the server. Please make sure that you are connected to the internet.
GENERIC.NO_PARTY_ACTIVE: No party is set as active.
GENERIC.NO_SERVER_IDS: Could not get id data from server.

GUESTS.BLOCK_GUEST_TEXT: {{name}} will be blocked and removed from the party. Joining again will not be possible. Additionally all posted pictures will be permanently deleted. Unblocking {{name}} will only be possible by contacting our support team. Do you want to continue?
GUESTS.BLOCK_ERROR_OFFLINE: You are currently offline. To block a guest please go online first!
GUESTS.OPEN_PROFILE_ERROR_OFFLINE: To visit a Facebook profile please go online first!
GUESTS.REFRESH_ERROR_OFFLINE: You can only refresh guests when you are online.

LOGIN.BELLOW_BUTTON_TEXT:
Will NOT be used to post anything or contact friends.
Only used for easy and fast authentification!
LOGIN.LOGIN_ERROR: It was not possible to log in.
LOGIN.FACEBOOK_ERROR_CONNECT: It was not possible to connect with facebook. Please close the app, restart and then try again.

PARTY_CREATE.CREATE_PARTY_ERROR: There was a problem so that the party could not be created.
PARTY_CREATE.CREATE_PARTY_ERROR_OFFLINE: To create a party please go online first!
PARTY_CREATE.CREATE_PARTY_MISSING_DATE: Please fill in a party date!
PARTY_CREATE.CREATE_PARTY_MISSING_NAME: Please fill in a party name!

PARTY_CREATE_SUCCESS.CODE_EXPLANATION: Don`t worry you and all other guests can display the code anytime by pressing the "Show Join Code" button on the "Parties" tab to allow other peole to join.
PARTY_CREATE_SUCCESS.HEADLINE: Congratulations you just created a party!
PARTY_CREATE_SUCCESS.PARTY_PAGE_EXPLANATION: You did also receive a link to your special party page via email. On this page all the pictures get displayed automatically as they get uploaded. Simply open the page on any Computer, TV or other device to see and share every moment as it happens.
PARTY_CREATE_SUCCESS.PRE_QR_CODE: Now you should get the first guests to join by either inviting them by pressing the button "Invite Guests" on the "Parties" tab or by scanning this QR-Code:

PARTIES.LEAVE_PARTY_ERROR_OFFLINE: To leave a party please go online first!
PARTIES.LEAVE_PARTY_TEXT: You are leaving the party now.

PARTY_ADMIN.BACKGROUND_CHANGE_ERROR: Sadly it was not possible to change the background image.
PARTY_ADMIN.DELETE_PARTY_ERROR: There was a problem, so the party could not be deleted.
PARTY_ADMIN.DELETE_PARTY_ERROR_OFFLINE: To delete a party please go online first!
PARTY_ADMIN.DELETE_PARTY_TEXT: You are deleting the party now.
PARTY_ADMIN.LOAD_SETTINGS_ERROR: Could not get the party settings.
PARTY_ADMIN.UPDATE_PARTY_ERROR: There was a problem, so the party could not be updated.
PARTY_ADMIN.UPDATE_PARTY_ERROR_OFFLINE: To make changes to a party please go online first!
PARTY_ADMIN.UPGRADE_PARTY_ERROR: There was a problem so that the party could not be upgraded.
PARTY_ADMIN.UPGRADE_PARTY_ERROR_OFFLINE: To upgrade a party please go online first!
PARTY_ADMIN.UPGRADE_TEXT: Choose the plan you want to upgrade your party to:

PICTURES.DELETE_ERROR_OFFLINE: To delete a picture please go online first!
PICTURES.DELETE_ERROR: There was a problem and the picture could not be deleted!
PICTURES.DELETE_TEXT: Are you sure you want to delete the picture? (this CANNOT be undone)
PICTURES.DOWNLOAD_ERROR: There was a problem. The picture could not be saved.
PICTURES.DOWNLOAD_ERROR_OFFLINE: To download a picture please go online first!
PICTURES.REFRESH_ERROR_OFFLINE: You can only refresh pictures when you are online.
